body:
Our NBA Model has your exclusive **NBA Playoff Predictions** populating all year. So you can see the chance of your team making the playoffs, to winning the chip. Each week you'll see East and West tables on: * Chances of making the playoffs * Having the best regular season record in their conference * Finishing with the league's best record * Making the Finals * Winning the Title Convert those percentages into odds and you can find some great betting opportunities. - - - ## **NBA Playoff Predictions** This bad boy is updated every day.
- - -
Want **the biggest promos?** Start with **$2,000** in bonus bets. **JOIN POINTSBET NOW!**
- - - ## **NBA Futures Interpretation** Let's start by looking at the best odds from all the sportsbooks, courtesy of Odds Boom: ![nba playoff predictions](/images/uploads/nba-playoff-predictions-15-feb.png "nba playoff predictions") Given they are the top rated team by the Model, you want to be on the **Utah Jazz**. $15 (+1400) is a bet every day of the week. So is $8 for the Western Conference. The Model gives them a 23.1% of winning the title, and a 32.2% of reaching the Finals. The **Nets**, as we keep saying, are just the wrong odds. The three prong star power is completely overvalued by dumb money, and therefore, the sportsbooks keep the price too low. In the East, you want the **Bucks**. Clearly. It just doesn't respect the **76ers** like the Market. Giannis and co are a huge overlay. Don't forget how short they were last year, trading at +400 most the season. Back to the West, the **Lakers** and **Clippers** are huge title hopes, but they are too short at the moment. The **Nuggets** and **Suns** are actually the value picks. Finally, the Raptors are a huge overlay in the East. To sum that up, the best value is: 1. **Jazz** 2. **Bucks** 3. **Suns, Nuggets, Raptor** - - - ## **More NBA Resources** We LOVE betting futures. Get our predictions before the year, as well as our quarterly updates: * **[NBA Rookie Of The Year](https://www.betrefinery.com/nba-betting/nba-rookie-of-the-year/)**[](https://www.betrefinery.com/nba-betting/nba-mvp-odds/) * **[NBA MVP](https://www.betrefinery.com/nba-betting/nba-mvp-odds/)** * [](https://www.betrefinery.com/nba-betting/nba-mvp-odds/)**[NBA Championship Odds & Picks](https://www.betrefinery.com/nba-betting/nba-championship-odds/)** * **[NBA Power Rankings](https://www.betrefinery.com/nba-betting/nba-power-rankings)** - - - ### **Want more insight? Get the weekly email.** ### **We promise it's worth your time.** ###
title: Your 2021 NBA Playoff Predictions: Back The Jazz
